trans-unit.resname: YWOE·1 | Cerise, Slayer of Fear | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cerise, Slayer of Fear
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·1 | Cerise, Slayer of Fear | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike, lifelink At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you gained life this turn, seek a card with the highest mana value among cards in your library with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·2 | Dedicated Dollmaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dedicated Dollmaker
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·2 | Dedicated Dollmaker | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Dedicated Dollmaker enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target nonland, nontoken permanent. Its controller creates a token that's a copy of it, except it's not legendary and it's an artifact in addition to its other types. {1}{W}: Tokens you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Activate only once.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·3 | The Conundrum of Bowls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Conundrum of Bowls
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·3 | The Conundrum of Bowls | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Seek a card with mana value less than the number of cards in your hand. II — Seek a card with mana value greater than the number of cards in your hand. III — Count the number of cards in your hand. You may cast a spell with mana value equal to that number from your hand without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·4 | Paths of Tuinvale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Paths of Tuinvale
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·4 | Paths of Tuinvale | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one or both — • Return target creature you control to its owner's hand. That card perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast." • Return target creature you don't control to its owner's hand. That card perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast."

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·5 | Talion's Throneguard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talion's Throneguard
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·5 | Talion's Throneguard | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash Bargain Flying When Talion's Throneguard enters the battlefield, return up to one target spell or nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Talion's Throneguard was bargained, that card perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} more to cast."

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·6 | Tome of Gadwick | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tome of Gadwick
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·6 | Tome of Gadwick | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, conjure a random card from Tome of Gadwick's spellbook into your hand. Equip {1}

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·7 | Dunbarrow Revivalist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dunbarrow Revivalist
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·7 | Dunbarrow Revivalist | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Bargain When Dunbarrow Revivalist enters the battlefield, you get a one-time boon with "When one or more creatures enter the battlefield under your control, create a Wicked Role token attached to one of them." Then if Dunbarrow Revivalist was bargained, return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·8 | Underbridge Warlock | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Underbridge Warlock
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·8 | Underbridge Warlock | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch When Underbridge Warlock enters the battlefield, you get a one-time boon with "At the beginning of your end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, each opponent loses 5 life and you gain 5 life." At the beginning of your end step, if you have a boon, you mill three cards, draw a card, and lose 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·9 | Draconic Debut | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Draconic Debut
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·9 | Draconic Debut | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draconic Debut deals X damage to any target. The next Dragon creature spell you cast costs {X} less to cast.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·10 | Heir to Dragonfire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heir to Dragonfire
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·10 | Heir to Dragonfire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {R}: Heir to Dragonfire gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}, Reveal Heir to Dragonfire from your hand: Heir to Dragonfire perpetually becomes a Dragon, gets +3/+3, and gains flying.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·11 | Overcooked | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Overcooked
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·11 | Overcooked | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Players can't gain life. Celebration — At the beginning of your end step, create a Food token. If two or more nonland permanents entered the battlefield under your control this turn, instead conjure a card named Food Fight onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·12 | Victory of the Pyrohammer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Victory of the Pyrohammer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·12 | Victory of the Pyrohammer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Victory of the Pyrohammer deals 4 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. Victory of the Pyrohammer gains "Damage isn't removed from creatures during cleanup steps." II, III — Victory of the Pyrohammer deals 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·13 | A Golden Opportunity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: A Golden Opportunity
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·13 | A Golden Opportunity | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Conjure a card named Gilded Goose onto the battlefield. II, III — You may tap an untapped Bird you control and sacrifice an artifact. If you do, conjure a card named Golden Egg onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·14 | Hex, Kellan's Companion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hex, Kellan's Companion
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·14 | Hex, Kellan's Companion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste Whenever you cast an Adventure spell, if Hex, Kellan's Companion is on the battlefield or in exile, it perpetually gets +1/+1. Then if it's on the battlefield, exile it with a fetch counter on it. Whenever you cast a spell from exile, if Hex is in exile with a fetch counter on it, put it onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·15 | Swine Rebellion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swine Rebellion
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·15 | Swine Rebellion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If you control three or more Boars with different names, conjure each card from the Three Pigs spellbook onto the battlefield. If you control two or fewer Boars with different names, conjure two cards of your choice from the Three Pigs spellbook into your hand, then put one of them onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·16 | Accident-Prone Apprentice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Accident-Prone Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 肇事学徒 // 两栖事故
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·16 | Accident-Prone Apprentice | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Accident-Prone Apprentice perpetually gets +1/+1. This ability also triggers if Accident-Prone Apprentice is in exile.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·16 | Amphibian Accident | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amphibian Accident
trans-unit.target: 肇事学徒 // 两栖事故
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·16 | Amphibian Accident | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·17 | Drover of the Swine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drover of the Swine
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·17 | Drover of the Swine | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Drover of the Swine enters the battlefield, choose one — • Conjure a card of your choice from the Three Pigs spellbook onto the battlefield. • Return up to three target Boar creature cards with different names from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·18 | First Little Pig | Card Name
trans-unit.source: First Little Pig
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·18 | First Little Pig | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{G/W}: Exile target artifact or enchantment. Activate only once.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·19 | Grow Old Together | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grow Old Together
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·19 | Grow Old Together | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Seek two creature cards from among the top ten cards of your library, then shuffle. Creature cards in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·20 | High Fae Prankster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: High Fae Prankster
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·20 | High Fae Prankster | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch When High Fae Prankster enters the battlefield, choose up to one — • Perpetually exchange target creature's base power with another target creature's base power. • High Fae Prankster perpetually has base power and toughness 4/1.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·21 | Jewel Mine Overseer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jewel Mine Overseer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·21 | Jewel Mine Overseer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Jewel Mine Overseer enters the battlefield, conjure seven cards named Seven Dwarves on top of your library. They perpetually gain "When this creature enters the battlefield, draw a card." Then shuffle. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·22 | Outfitted Jouster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Outfitted Jouster
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·22 | Outfitted Jouster | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Outfitted Jouster enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Steelclaw Lance and a card named Brawler's Plate onto the battlefield and attach them to Outfitted Jouster. If damage would be dealt to Outfitted Jouster while it's equipped, prevent that damage. When damage is prevented this way, sacrifice an Equipment attached to Outfitted Jouster.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·23 | Porcine Portent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Porcine Portent
trans-unit.target: 化猪征兆 // 借条火腿
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·23 | Porcine Portent | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Porcine Portent enters the battlefield, conjure a card of your choice from the Three Pigs spellbook onto the battlefield. Boars you control get +1/+1.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·23 | Lend a Ham | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lend a Ham
trans-unit.target: 化猪征兆 // 借条火腿
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·23 | Lend a Ham | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. You gain 1 life for each Boar you control.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·24 | Second Little Pig | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Second Little Pig
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·24 | Second Little Pig | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}{W/B}{W/B}: Second Little Pig perpetually becomes a Boar Spirit with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying. Activate only if Second Little Pig isn't a Spirit.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·25 | Steady Tortoise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Steady Tortoise
trans-unit.target: 稳步慢龟 // 脱兔冲锋
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·25 | Steady Tortoise | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ward {2} Whenever you attack, Steady Tortoise perpetually gets +1/+1. This ability also triggers if Steady Tortoise is in exile.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·25 | Harried Dash | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Harried Dash
trans-unit.target: 稳步慢龟 // 脱兔冲锋
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·25 | Harried Dash | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·26 | Stormkeld Curator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stormkeld Curator
trans-unit.target: 暴风域监管人 // 巨人之秘
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·26 | Stormkeld Curator | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Stormkeld Curator enters the battlefield, you may put any number of Aura cards from your graveyard and/or hand onto the battlefield attached to it.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·26 | Giant Secrets | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Giant Secrets
trans-unit.target: 暴风域监管人 // 巨人之秘
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·26 | Giant Secrets | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Conjure X random cards from Giant Secrets's spellbook into your hand.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·27 | Syr Joshua and Syr Saxon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Syr Joshua and Syr Saxon
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·27 | Syr Joshua and Syr Saxon | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Double team If you control exactly two legendary permanents named Syr Joshua and Syr Saxon, the "legend rule" doesn't apply to them. Each other creature you control named Syr Joshua and Syr Saxon has battle cry.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·28 | Third Little Pig | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Third Little Pig
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·28 | Third Little Pig | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you conjure one or more other cards, Third Little Pig perpetually gets +1/+1. This ability also triggers if Third Little Pig is in your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·29 | Captivating Crossroads | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Captivating Crossroads
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·29 | Captivating Crossroads | Card Text
trans-unit.source: During your first three turns of the game, Captivating Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped if you were the starting player. As Captivating Crossroads enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·30 | Loch Larent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Loch Larent
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: YWOE·30 | Loch Larent | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Loch Larent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {1}{U}, {T}: Scry 3. Target opponent gets a one-time boon with "When you cast a creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield tapped and with a stun counter on it." Activate only during your turn and only once.
